snippet: Neymar, a target of European teams since he was 14, has stayed home and become the face (and future) of his sport’s South American mecca.
abstract: Profile of Brazilian soccer prodigy Neymar, who, at 20 years old, is already the highest-paid and most admired soccer player in Brazil; he has opted to stay in his home country rather than building his career in a high-profile European league, as many other South American players have, and will play for Brazil at the London Olympic Games.
lead_paragraph: Neymar, a target of European teams since he was 14, has stayed home and become the face (and future) of his sport’s South American mecca.

headline.seo: Neymar, Soccer Prodigy, Is at Home in Brazil
headline.main: A Soccer Prodigy, at Home in Brazil
headline.print_headline: A Soccer Prodigy, At Home in Brazil
